title: Familiar Spirits 2010 VERSION.
description: The ghostly legend of Sarah Jane's Civil war torn family is as relevant today as it was in the 1960's where FAMILIAR SPIRITS finds an emotionally deteriorating, expectant mother muddling through her own war and anticipating the return of her husband, a soldier serving in Vietnam.This edition of the play is the original version presented as a dinner show. The play was commissioned by Port Arthur Little Theatre in celebration of the grand opening of Beau Reve, a gourmet restaurant and events venue in Port Arthur, Texas.THIS VERSION OF FAMILIAR SPIRITS IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE AS IT WAS A LIMITED ENGAGEMENT. A NEWER VERSION IS AVAILABLE AS A ONE ACT PLAY.
author: Cody Underwood
